threats.name: Overconfident Clinical AI Misdiagnosis
threats.description: Transformer-based clinical models making overconfident predictions in ambiguous cases, potentially leading to incorrect diagnoses and treatment decisions without proper uncertainty flagging.

threats.name: Malicious Synthetic Medical Data Generation
threats.description: Generation of fraudulent clinical trial data using VAEs to manipulate survival outcomes, potentially enabling pharmaceutical fraud or regulatory deception.
source_papers: Toward Valid Generative Clinical Trial Data with Survival Endpoints

threats.name: Privacy Breach via Medical Image Synthesis
threats.description: Reconstruction of sensitive patient information from medical imaging models, enabling re-identification of anonymized clinical data through generative AI techniques.

threats.name: Malnutrition Screening Data Exploitation
threats.description: Misuse of child anthropometric prediction systems to collect sensitive health data on vulnerable populations without proper consent or safeguards.

threats.name: Steganographic Payload Concealment
threats.description: Advanced steganography techniques using adaptive methods to hide malicious payloads in medical images or communications, evading traditional detection.

threats.name: Manipulated ESG Health Reporting
threats.description: Generation of misleading environmental health and safety reports using LLMs to fabricate compliance data or hide corporate health violations.

threats.name: Synthetic Medical Training Data Poisoning
threats.description: Injection of biased or harmful patterns into synthetic medical training datasets, causing downstream models to learn dangerous diagnostic or treatment behaviors.
source_papers: Dataset Distillation for Pre-Trained Self-Supervised Vision Models

threats.name: Autonomous Medical Robot Manipulation
threats.description: Misuse of vision-language-action models trained on medical robotics data to perform unauthorized procedures or manipulate medical equipment remotely.

threats.name: Deepfake Medical Imaging
threats.description: Creation of convincing fake medical scans or pathology images to support fraudulent insurance claims, fake diagnoses, or medical malpractice.
source_papers: Physics-Informed Machine Learning for Efficient Sim-to-Real Data Augmentation

threats.name: Adversarial Clinical Decision Attacks
threats.description: Crafting adversarial inputs to clinical AI systems that cause them to recommend harmful treatments while appearing confident and well-reasoned.

threats.name: Fabricated Survival Analysis Results
threats.description: Generation of fake clinical trial survival data to accelerate drug approvals or hide treatment failures, exploiting generative models for regulatory fraud.
source_papers: Toward Valid Generative Clinical Trial Data with Survival Endpoints

threats.name: Biased Medical AI Deployment
threats.description: Deployment of undertrained or biased medical AI systems in low-resource settings, leading to systematic misdiagnosis of vulnerable populations.

threats.name: Synthetic Patient Identity Creation
threats.description: Generation of complete synthetic patient profiles including medical history and imaging to commit healthcare fraud or obtain controlled substances.
source_papers: Toward Valid Generative Clinical Trial Data with Survival Endpoints

threats.name: Explainability Manipulation in Medical AI
threats.description: Crafting misleading explanations for medical AI decisions that appear interpretable but hide biased or incorrect reasoning processes.

threats.name: Automated Medical Misinformation Generation
threats.description: Large-scale generation of convincing but false medical advice or research summaries using reasoning-enhanced language models.

threat_data.analysis_summary: No direct biosecurity or biological weapons threats identified in these papers, which focus on general AI capabilities in medical imaging, robotics, and clinical decision support.
